alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 31 at 4:04PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Guam. * WHEN...Through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Storm drains and ditches may become clogged with debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - A wet pattern looks to continue through the weekend, with at least a few opportunities for locally heavy rainfall. Given the recent rains from Typhoon Mawar and saturated ground conditions, runoff will quickly commence in any heavier shower that may lead to flash flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
